query: Create a test case for password validation
context_preview:
[Document 1] data\sample_dataset\user-signup\Error_Codes.txt
ERR_003: Password Too Weak
Description: Password does not meet security requirements
HTTP Status: 400 Bad Request
Message: "Password must b

use_cases.title: Validate Password Strength
use_cases.goal: Ensure the password meets all security requirements.
steps: User enters 'Password123!' in the password field.
User clicks on the signup button.
expected_results: User proceeds to the next step of the signup process.
negative_cases: User enters a password without an uppercase letter.
User enters a password without a lowercase letter.
User enters a password without a number.
User enters a password without a special character.
User enters a password with less than 8 characters.
boundary_cases: User enters a password with exactly 8 characters.
User enters a password with exactly 128 characters.

use_cases.title: Password Mismatch Detection
use_cases.goal: Verify that an error is displayed when the password and confirm password fields do not match.
steps: User enters 'ValidPassword123!' in the password field.
User enters 'InvalidPassword123!' in the confirm password field.
User clicks on the signup button.
expected_results: An error message 'Passwords do not match' is displayed.

use_cases.title: Signup Rate Limiting Enforcement
use_cases.goal: Ensure the system limits signup attempts to prevent abuse.
preconditions: User has already made 4 signup attempts in the last hour
steps: User attempts to signup for the 5th time within an hour.
User attempts to signup for the 6th time within an hour.
expected_results: Signup is allowed for the 5th attempt.
An error message 'Too many signup attempts. Please try again later.' is displayed for the 6th attempt.
boundary_cases: User makes exactly 5 signup attempts within an hour.
